name: Today
detailedForecast: A chance of rain and patchy fog before 1pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of rain and patchy fog between 2pm and 3pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 59. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
